quest.name: When Feathers Fly
journal:
Eshana needs help with a pair of troublesome griffins.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: We have a requessst from the griffin handlers. Giff tells me that a young pair of griffin sssiblings butted heads during training, and then flew off in a flurry of talons and feathers.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: These cloudkin are prideful creatures─easily aggravated and difficult to tame─but you ssseem to have a way with them.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: If you're willing to help, they were lassst ssseen heading north. The smaller griffin veered ssslightly to the wessst after a final ssswipe from his bigger brother, who banked away to the eassst.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Once you've rallied the younger's ssspirits and sssoothed the older's agitation, I'm certain they'll find their way back to the ssstables on their own.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The griffin responds to your soothing tone, becoming visibly calmer!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The griffin eyes you with obvious distrust...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The griffin appears agitated and unhappy. Use the soothe emote to calm the creature.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The griffin's mood seems improved by your encouragement!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The griffin seems hesitant and wary...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The small griffin appears to be sulking after losing to his older brother. Use the rally emote to lift his spirits.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Thank you, Forename─the griffin sssiblings are back in their ssstables, sssafe and sssound. They show great promissse, but the lively temperament for which they are admired is a double-edged sssword for those who ssstruggle to tame them.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: And yet you handled them with relative ease! You have a talent for reaching the heartsss of both man and beassst─the trainers will be mossst enviousss to hear of your effortless sssuccess.
